question: You want to study in another country in some university. You need an accommodation to stay. Your friend is studying in the same university. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:Give details about your study plansWhat type of accommodation are you looking forSuggest how your friend can search a place for you.Write at least 150 words.You do not need to write any addresses.
text: I hope you’re doing well. I am writing this letter to let you know that I’ve got an approval letter for a student visa from Canada yesterday in your Lambton college. Currently, I’m looking for an apartment to live in.

Furthermore, I have completed my Commerce in high school. I've planned to study a two year diploma course in international business (BINM). Moreover, my classes are going to start in the following month (I.e. August 25, 2020). A week before, there will be an orientation that has to be attended.

On the other hand, I was trying to look for an apartment or the basement with a single bedroom including kitchen and bathroom.Usually, I’ve never shared my room with a stranger. However, I was unable to find an accommodation till now.

My neighbours came back from Canada last year. Also, they found an apartment for them by using advertisements posted outside of the grocery stores and online sites. I was wondering if you could try the same way.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
